19367.「レーノス ユウギリ嬢ちゃん……\n すぐに 助けてやるからな。\n あと ちょ:
Renosu, Miss Yugiri... we'll help you soon.
Just wait a little longer!

19368.「よお 支部長のおっさん！\n 必殺技を覚えて 帰ってきたぜ！:
Hey, old branch manager! I'm back with some
special moves!

19369.「……うむ。見事じゃ <pc>！\n 今こそ 森の怒りを鎮める方法を\n お前さ:
...Mm. Brilliant <pc>! Now I shall
tell you how to appease the wrath of the
forest.

19370.「森の怒りとは モリナラ大森林の樹々に宿る\n 精霊たちの ヒトへの怒りや 憎悪:
The Wrath of the Forest is the result of the negative emotions of the Hate Trees of the Molinara Forest, such as anger and hatred
toward humans.

19371.「そして 今 その負の感情は集合し\n モリナラ大森林の奥深く 緑の聖域にて\n:
And now, those negative emotions have gathered
and become hatred incarnate in the depths of
the Molinara Forest, in the Green Sanctuary.

19372.「その名も 憎悪の精霊樹。\n 森の怒りを鎮めるには こいつを\n 倒さなくては:
Its name is the Hate Tree. To appease the
wrath of the forest, this tree must be
defeated.

19373.「ただし モリナラ大森林の中で\n 憎悪の精霊樹と 戦ったとしても\n 倒しきる:
However, even if one were to fight the Hate
Tree in the Molinara Forest, it would be
difficult to defeat it.

19374.「なにしろ 向こうのテリトリー内じゃ。\n 不利となれば 相手は お前さんを\n:
After all, you are in their territory. If you
are at a disadvantage, they can do whatever
they want with you.

19375.「それを防ぐには 妖精たちのポルカを使って\n 周りの精霊力を 味方につければよ:
To prevent this, you can use Brownie Boost to
get the spiritual forces around you on your
side. That way, you won't be at his disposal.

19376.「これが 森の怒りを鎮めるために\n お前さんが やるべきことの すべてじゃ。:
This is all you need to do to appease the
forest.

19377.「すげえ！ ……ダジャレなしでも \n 長いセリフ 言うことできたんだな。\n:
Amazing! You could have said that long line
without any puns. I could feel how serious the
old man was!

19378.「あまり言ってくださるな スピルどの。\n いくら わしでも こんな時くらいは\:
Don't say too much, Spiel. Even I forget a pun
at least once in a while.

19379.「……ゴホン！ さあ 選ばれし レンジャーよ。\n お前さんのチカラで 憎悪の精:
...gosh! Come, my chosen ranger. Now, my
chosen ranger, use your power to defeat the
Hate Tree and restore peace to Molinara!

19380.「うむ！ では 後のことは まかせたぞ。\n 精霊樹との戦いでは 妖精たちのポル:
Mm! Then I'll leave the rest to you. Don't
forget to use Brownie Boost in your fight
against the spirit tree.

19381.「では 頼んだぞ……と思ったら\n なんじゃ その 頼まれごとの数は！？:
Now, I'm going to ask you for a favor... but
what's with all the favors you're getting?

19382.「そんなでは この使命 まかせられんぞ！\n ええい。さっさと 手を空けてくるの:
You can't leave this mission to me! No. Now go
empty your hands!

19383.「この期におよんで 何をためらう？\n ユウギリも レーノスも お前さんの助けを:
What are you waiting for? Yugiri and Renosu
are waiting for your help!

19384.「わしからも 頼む！\n どうか モリナラ大森林の怒りを鎮めて\n じんめんじゅ:
I beg you too! Please, appease the wrath of
the Molinara Forest and save all of us who are
now human!

19385.「……なぜだ？ ヒトよ。\n なぜ 我らの怒りにふれて 無事でいられる？:
...Why? Why, human. How is it that you can
survive our wrath?

19386.「こいつが 憎悪の精霊樹か。\n かーっ！ 見るからに 陰気そうなヤツだな。\n:
So this is the Hate Tree. Kaa! He's a gloomy-
looking fellow to look at. As a fellow spirit,
I'm embarrassed!

19387.「……そうか。精霊を身に宿すがゆえに\n 我らの怒りから 逃れえたか。:
I see. You have escaped our wrath because you
carry the spirit in your body.

19388.「ちいさき精霊よ。\n ヒトは 欲深く 愚かで あさましき存在。\n なにゆえ:
O little spirit! Human beings are greedy,
foolish and wicked. Why do you side with them?

19389.「うるっせーな！ たしかに こいつら\n 欲深で 愚かで あさましいかもしんねー:
Shut up! I know these guys are greedy, stupid,
and asinine, but I know there's more to them
than that!

19390.「モリナラ支部の連中が\n この大森林の自然を守ろうと\n 戦ってることを オレ:
I know that the Molinara Forest Branch is
fighting to protect the nature of the Molinara
Forest!

19391.「伐採同盟の連中だって\n 自分たちの暮らしや 大切な者のため\n 必死だったこ:
I know that the logging alliances were
desperate for their livelihoods and for those
they cared about!

19392.「そして なにより オレの相棒……\n <cs_pchero>が どんだけ がん:
And most of all, I know how hard my buddy...
<cs_pchero> has been working to get where he
is!

19393.「そっちこそ 何を知ってんだよ？\n オメーは ヒトの素晴らしいトコ\n これっ:
What do you know about anything? You don't
understand a single wonderful thing about
human beings!

19394.「ヒトに宿りし精霊は その心も毒されるか。\n ならば お前の その入れ物を壊し:
Is the spirit that dwells in man also poisoned in his mind? If so, I will break that container of yours and bring you back to your
senses.

19395.「また来たのか ヒトに宿る精霊よ。\n 今度こそ お前の その入れ物を壊して\n:
Have you come again, spirit inhabiting human
beings? This time, I will break that container
of yours and bring you back to your senses.

19396.「……おのれ あさましき侵略者め。\n ここは 貴様たちの領域にあらず。\n 立:
You wicked invaders. This is not your domain.
Leave now!

19397.「まずいぜ 相棒っ！\n モリナラ全体が オレたちを拒んでやがる！:
This is not good, buddy! The whole Molinara is
against us!

19400.「……おのれ あさましき侵略者め。\n ここは 貴様たちの領域にあらず。\n 立:
You wicked invaders. This is not your domain.
Leave now!

19401.「……これも 効かぬのか。: I wonder if this will not work either.

19402.「どうやら 妖精たちのポルカを使った成果が\n 出たみたいだぜ 相棒？:
Well, looks like your Brownie Boost has paid
off, buddy, huh?

19403.「……そうであったな。ヒトは いつの時代も\n こざかしい知恵と技を 武器として:
That's right. Humans have always invaded our
forests with their wiles and skills as
weapons.

19404.「だが 我は 決して ヒトを許さぬ！\n モリナラの樹々に宿りし 精霊たちよ。\:
But I will never forgive humans! Spirits who dwell in the trees of Molinara. I, who am the incarnation of your hatred, ask you to lend me
your power!

19405.「こいつは キリがねーな。\n あのネガティブ野郎の こり固まった憎しみを\n:
This guy's a loose cannon. We'll never solve
this unless we deal with that negative guy's
hardened hatred.

19406.「……なあ 相棒。\n ひとつ いい方法が あるんだ。: Hey, buddy. Hey, I've got a better idea.

19407.「元は どっちも 同じ精霊だ。\n オレが あいつと 一体化してやれば\n あい:
They are both the same spirit. I think if I
unite with him, I can neutralize his hatred.

19408.「いや。オレが そうしてーんだ！\n あいつにも ヒトの素晴らしさってモンを\n:
No, no, no. I want it that way! I want him to
understand the beauty of human beings.

19409.「だからよ……これで お別れだ。\n あばよ！ 相棒！: So... this is goodbye. Bye! Buddy!

19410.「ヌオォォォォ……な なにをっ！？\n 怒りが……憎悪が……消えてゆく……。:
Noooooo... what? The anger... the hatred... is
gone...

19411.<center>ヒトよ……。\nわが一部となった 精霊スピルに免じ\n今は お前:
Human... I forgive you now for the spirit
Spiel that has become a part of me.

19412.<center>だが ヒトが存在する限り\n必ず また同じことが繰り返されるだろ:
But as long as humans exist, it will surely
happen again. So...

19413.<center>……だから そうならないよーに\nがんばってくれよ！ 相棒！: ...so please don't let that happen! Buddy!

19414.「森の怒りが鎮まる気配 感じておったよ。\n どうやら すべて 終わったようじゃ:
I could feel the forest's anger subsiding.
Looks like it's all over. Well done!

19415.「お前さんこそ レンジャーの中のレンジャー。\n その栄誉に 見合うものではない:
You are the ranger among rangers. I know it's
not worthy of the honor, but please allow me
to present this to you.

19417.「ううっ。ホントに 戻ってこれてよかった。\n あのまま 一生 じんめんじゅだっ:
Ugh. I'm really glad I came back. If I had
stayed a jinmenju for the rest of my life, I
would have been unable to get married.

19418.「本部のレンジャーや 伐採同盟の連中も\n それぞれの場所に 帰ってったぜ。\n:
The rangers at the headquarters and the logging alliances have gone home to their respective places. As expected, I don't feel
like fighting anymore.

19419.「しかし 伐採同盟のヤツらの今後を\n どうするか 考えてやんなくちゃな。\n:
But I have to think about what to do with the
guys in the logging alliance. I don't think
I'll be able to go to a party for a while.

19420.「……うむ。うむ。\n 任務 ご苦労だったな。\n ふたりとも よく戻ってきてく:
...Mm. Mm-hmm. Thanks for the mission. You
both came back well.

19421.「これから 大いに 忙しくなるが\n 今日のところは 皆の無事を祝って\n 宴を:
We're going to be very busy from now on, but
for now, let's have a party to celebrate
everyone's safety!

19422.その夜 もよおされた宴の中で\n<pc>は もうひとりの仲間が\nどこへ行ったの:
That night at a banquet, <pc> told
everyone where his other companion had gone.

19423.たがいの無事を祝う祝宴は\nいなくなった仲間を しのぶ宴に変わり\n静かに夜は:
The feast to celebrate each other's safety
turned into a party to remember their lost
companions, and the night passed quietly.

19424.「おはよう <pc>。\n レーノスと ユウギリなら すでに起きて\n モリナラ:
Good morning <pc>. Renosu and Yugiri
are already up and gone to patrol Molinara.

19425.「……ああ。お前さんは いいんじゃ。\n じつは 今回の件で <pc>の\n こ:
Ah. You're all right. As a matter of fact,
I've decided to terminate <pc>'s
position here because of this incident.

19426.「お前さんには 任地などにとらわれず\n 世界中の森を回り 自然を守ってほしい。:
I want you to visit forests all over the world and protect nature, regardless of where you are assigned. Renosu and Yugiri agreed with
me.

19427.「これは 上司命令じゃからな。\n 逆らうことは 許さんぞ！:
This is an order from my superiors. I will not
tolerate any disobedience!

19428.「今 この時をもって <pc>の\n モリナラ支部での任を解く！\n これまで:
As of this moment, I am relinquishing my position at the Molinara branch of the ! Thank you very much for your
hard work.

19429.「それでは 選ばれし レンジャーよ。\n お前さんの 今後の活躍を期待しておる！:
Well then, my chosen ranger. I look forward to
your future endeavors! Wherever you go, do it
well.

25073.「……チクショウ！ \n これが どうとでもできるってことか。\n 失敗したぜっ:
...Damn! So this is how it's supposed to be. I
screwed up!

25074.「……相棒。今度こそ 忘れずに \n 妖精たちのポルカを使って 戦うぞ！:
...buddy. This time, don't forget, we're gonna
fight them with Brownie Boost polkas!
